lead_paragraph: IOC President Thomas Bach spoke out Tuesday against the "nuclear option" of imposing a complete ban on Russian athletes for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, prompting a debate that laid much of the blame for the scandal on the World Anti-Doping Agency.

headline.print_headline: IOC Members Bash World Anti-Doping Body Over Russia Scandal
headline.main: IOC Members Bash World Anti-Doping Body Over Russia Scandal
